```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(readxl)
library(janitor)
library(haven)
library(rvest)
library(stringr)
library(forcats)
library(ggridges)
library(ggthemes)
library(lubridate)
pols_month = read.csv(file = "./data/pols-month.csv") %>%
  clean_names() %>% 
  mutate(mon = as.Date(mon,format = "%Y-%m-%d")) %>% 
  mutate(first_day = lubridate::floor_date(mon, unit = "month"))

gdp_data = read.csv(file = "./data/GDP.csv") %>%
  clean_names() %>% 
  mutate(date = as.Date(date,format = "%Y-%m-%d")) %>% 
  mutate(first_day = lubridate::floor_date((date), unit = "month"))

combined_data = left_join(pols_month, gdp_data, by = "first_day")
```
